0.name: Classic
0.description: The only card back you'll ever need.

1.name: Pandaria
1.description: Hearthstone is a very popular game in Pandaria.  Official card game of the Shado-Pan!
1.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, April 2014.

2.name: Dame Hazelbark
2.description: Unlike the Ancient of War, she prefers the quiet of a friendly card game.
2.howToGet: Acquired from purchasing the Hero Dame Hazelbark.

3.name: Ready to Rumble!
3.description: In Stranglethorn did Rastakhan A stately card back, gold, decree: Where trolls and sacred loa ran In pits so loud and choked with fans who cheered them on with glee.
3.howToGet: Originally acquired from the Rastakhanâ€™s Rumble pre-purchase bundle.

4.name: Call of the Void
4.description: A card back unleashed from the realm of infinite darkness. Looks wicked rad under a blacklight.

5.name: Thunder Bluff
5.description: Unofficial slogan:  'Great warriors come from happy Tauren tribes.  Happy Tauren come from Thunder Bluff!'
5.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, February 2016 or when available in the shop.

6.name: 30 Years of Blizzard
6.description: Turns out things can stay frosty for a seriously long time.
6.howToGet: Acquired from the shop during the anniversary event.

7.name: Rainbow!
7.description: Unfortunately, the rainbow generator can only produce oval rainbows.  Gnomish technology still has a ways to go.
7.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, June 2014.

8.name: Hallow's End
8.description: The Hallow's End candy bucket!  Or the Headless Horseman's spare head!  Stick your hand in and find out.
8.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, October 2014 or when available in the shop.

9.name: Call of the Light
9.description: A card back called forth from the realm of undying light. Gives hope to all mankind (except your opponent.)

10.name: Good Cheer
10.description: We get by with a little help from our friends. In chat. By posting funny emotes.

11.name: Book of Explorers
11.description: We all knew that the forces of good would win because they have better hats.
11.howToGet: Acquired from completing the explorers' book in Galakrond's Awakening Heroic mode.

12.name: Hamuul
12.description: Dont call him Ham unless you want him to have a beef with you
12.howToGet: Acquired by pre-purchasing Forged in the Barrens.

13.name: HearthS'mores
13.description: Gather 'round the fire for a toasty treat! (Card back not actually edible.)
13.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, July 2017.

14.name: Thrall
14.description: The World Shaman is probably THE best known celebrity in Azeroth.  It's a mystery that his signature necklace never caught on as a fashion trend.
14.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, December 2015 or when available in the shop.

15.name: Darkspear
15.description: Vol'jin's tribe, the Darkspear trolls, no longer practices cannibalism. Officially.
15.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, July 2015.

16.name: Wailing Caverns
16.description: It's gonna take a whole lot of work to get them to pipe down.
16.howToGet: Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, May 2021.

17.name: Ragnaros
17.description: The Firelord is most often seen relaxing in his hot tub, even when he's trying to burn down the world.
17.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, March 2015 or participating in Fire Festival 2019.

18.name: Frostmourne
18.description: The undealt shuffle among us, raised from the deck for the cold hand of the Lich King.
18.howToGet: Acquired from the Knights of the Frozen Throne pre-purchase bundle.

19.name: Rumble Runner
19.description: Your ranked opponents will shudder in fear knowing that they face... a champion.
19.howToGet: Acquired by successfully completing a Rumble Run.

20.name: Frostwolf Fervor
20.description: When Alliance battles firmly persist, you always prove that the Horde will resist!
20.howToGet: Earnable on the Fractured in Alterac reward track.
